hero.title: Your notes, 10x more powerful
hero.subtitle: Create, organize, and generate note summaries using artificial intelligence

organize.title: Organize topics
organize.desc: Group your notes into thematic folders to easily find and manage them.

create.title: Create notes
create.desc: Save your thoughts in markdown format with full text formatting support.

generate.title: Generate summaries
generate.desc: Use AI to automatically generate summaries of entire topics with references to sources.

step1.title: Create topics
step1.desc: Organize your knowledge into thematic categories

step2.title: Add notes
step2.desc: Save your thoughts, ideas, and knowledge in notes

step3.title: Generate summaries
step3.desc: Get concise summaries of entire topics thanks to AI

cta.title: Ready to increase your productivity?
cta.desc: Join the community of users who are already using the power of AI to organize their notes.

welcome.title: Welcome to 10x-knowtes
welcome.subtitle: Create, organize, and generate note summaries using artificial intelligence.
welcome.createTopicsDesc: Organize your notes into thematic folders to easily find them.
welcome.addNotesDesc: Create notes in markdown format with full text formatting support.
welcome.generateSummariesDesc: Use AI to automatically generate summaries of entire topics.
welcome.getStartedDesc: Select a topic from the left panel or create a new one to start working with notes.
welcome.rightClickTip: Right-click on a topic to see available options, such as adding notes or generating summaries.

navigation.createTopicDesc: Enter a name for the new topic. You can add notes to it later.
navigation.createTopicError: Failed to create topic. Please try again.
navigation.fetchErrorDesc: Failed to load topics. Please refresh the page.
navigation.createFirstTopic: Create your first topic to get started
navigation.noNotes: No notes in this topic yet
navigation.refreshTooltip: Refresh the topics list to see latest changes
navigation.refreshSuccessDesc: The topics list has been successfully refreshed.

topic.deleteTopicConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the topic with all its notes?
topic.topicDeletedDesc: The topic has been successfully deleted.
topic.nameChangedDesc: The topic name has been changed.
topic.noNotesYet: This topic doesn't contain any notes or summaries yet. Click "New note" to add your first note.
topic.fetchErrorDesc: Failed to load topic details. Please try again.
topic.updateErrorDesc: Failed to update topic. Please try again.
topic.deleteErrorDesc: Failed to delete topic. Please try again.
topic.generateErrorDesc: Failed to generate summary. Please try again.

note.deleteNoteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the note?
note.noteDeletedDesc: The note has been successfully deleted.
note.savedDesc: The note has been successfully saved.
note.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave this page?
note.noteCreatedDesc: The note has been successfully created.
note.fetchErrorDesc: Failed to load note details. Please try again.
note.saveErrorDesc: Failed to save note. Please try again.
note.deleteErrorDesc: Failed to delete note. Please try again.

summary.previewDescription: Review the generated summary before accepting or rejecting it.
summary.acceptError: Failed to accept summary. Please try again.
summary.rejectError: Failed to reject summary. Please try again.
summary.summaryAcceptedDesc: The summary has been saved to your notes.
summary.copiedDesc: The summary content has been copied to clipboard.
summary.deleteSummaryConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this summary?
summary.summaryDeletedDesc: The summary has been successfully deleted.
summary.deleteErrorDesc: Failed to delete summary. Please try again.
summary.useButtonsToClose: Please use the Accept or Reject buttons to proceed with the summary.
summary.fetchError: Failed to fetch summary. Please try again.

account.title: User account
account.subtitle: Manage your account and settings.
account.changePasswordDesc: Update your password to secure your account.
account.passwordChangedDesc: Your password has been successfully changed.
account.passwordError: New password and confirmation password do not match.
account.deleteAccountDesc: Permanently delete your account and all data.
account.deleteAccountWarning: After deleting your account, all your data will be permanently deleted. This operation cannot be undone.
account.deleteAccountConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
account.deleteAccountConfirmDesc: This operation will permanently delete your account and all data. This operation cannot be undone.
